mapper.select:
select t.order_no as orderNo, r.title, s.title as scenicName, r.pay_type as payType, r.num, t.mobile, r.state, r.pay_amount as payAmount, r.pay_time as payTime, r.create_time as createTime
from ticket_order t inner join `order` r on t.order_no = r.order_no left join scenic_ticket s on t.scenic_id = s.id where t.deleted = false
and (t.order_no like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%') or r.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%'))
and s.title like concat('%', #{param.scenicName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%')
and t.mobile like concat('%', #{param.mobile, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%')
and r.state = #{param.orderState}
order by t.id desc
